statements: SELECT * FROM temperature_logs
SELECT room_id, temperature FROM temperature_logs WHERE room_id = 1
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM temperature_logs
SELECT room_id, temperature, log_timestamp FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT room_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_logs GROUP BY room_id
SELECT room_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM temperature_logs GROUP BY room_id HAVING num_logs > 10
SELECT room_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM temperature_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2021-01-01' GROUP BY room_id
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM rooms;
SELECT room_name FROM rooms WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM rooms ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM rooms WHERE room_name LIKE '%kitchen%';
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM rooms WHERE room_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM rooms;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM rooms WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, room_id FROM rooms ORDER BY room_name DESC;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM rooms WHERE room_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT room_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM temperature_logs GROUP BY room_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25;
SELECT room_id, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_logs;
SELECT room_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_name, room_id FROM rooms;
SELECT room_id, trend_type, trend_value, trend_date FROM temperature_trends ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE room_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT room_id, AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM temperature_logs GROUP BY room_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25;
SELECT room_name, temperature FROM rooms JOIN temperature_logs ON rooms.room_id = temperature_logs.room_id WHERE room_name = 'Living Room' AND temperature > 20 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM temperature_logs GROUP BY room_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RoomTemperatures
SELECT room_name, temperature, timestamp FROM RoomTemperatures
SELECT room_id, room_name, temperature FROM RoomTemperatures ORDER BY room_id DESC
SELECT MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM RoomTemperatures
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM RoomLogs GROUP BY room_id
SELECT room_id, room_name, temperature, timestamp FROM RoomTemperatures WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY room_name ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT room_id, room_name, temperature FROM RoomTemperatures JOIN RoomSensors ON RoomTemperatures.room_id = RoomSensors.room_id WHERE sensor_type = 'thermometer' AND sensor_location = 'ceiling' ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT room_id, room_name, average_temperature AS avg_temp, max_temperature AS max_temp, min_temperature AS min_temp FROM RoomAnalytics WHERE room_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
SELECT room_id, room_name, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM RoomTemperatures LEFT JOIN RoomLogs ON RoomTemperatures.room_id = RoomLogs.room_id GROUP BY room_id, room_name ORDER BY log_count DESC
SELECT sensor_id, room_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM RoomSensors WHERE room_id = 3 AND sensor_location LIKE '%floor%' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_id, temperature FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT room_id, timestamp FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT room_name, avg_temp FROM room_statistics WHERE avg_temp < 22;
SELECT room_id, min_temp, max_temp FROM temperature_thresholds WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT room_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM rooms r JOIN temperature_logs tl ON r.room_id = tl.room_id GROUP BY room_name;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE room_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT room_name, trend_data->>'trend_type' AS trend_type FROM rooms r JOIN temperature_trends tt ON r.room_id = tt.room_id;
SELECT room_name, min_temp, max_temp FROM rooms r JOIN temperature_thresholds tt ON r.room_id = tt.room_id WHERE min_temp < 20 OR max_temp > 30;
SELECT room_name, stddev_samp(temperature) AS temperature_stddev FROM rooms r JOIN temperature_logs tl ON r.room_id = tl.room_id GROUP BY room_name;
